short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides you with quick url jumps to increase your browsing efficiency on chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing "Viz", a light-weight Chrome extension that boosts your browsing efficiency. It provides quick URL jumps by using prefixes to direct you to specific websites, saving you time and keystrokes. Perfect for both slow and fast typers and power users who prefer to quickly go to their frequent websites and perform searches directly.

Main Features:
- Use prefixes like "viz drive:1?document" to quickly access "https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/search?q=document."
- The extension automatically opens the first link in Google search results.

How to use:
- Simply type "viz" in your search bar.
- You can either type in your query straight away, which will open the first page from the results (excluding ads) or use a prefix.

Optional Parameters:
- You can include extra parameters using "?" for search and ":" for the user after a prefix. Use the extension's pop-up menu to assign parts of the URL responsible for search and a user.
